lead_paragraph: Bruce Bochy all but had his mind made up days ago: Madison Bumgarner would hit in an AL ballpark for interleague rather than using a designated hitter.

headline.print_headline: MadBum With the Bat and No DH Was an Easy Call for Bochy
headline.main: MadBum With the Bat and No DH Was an Easy Call for Bochy
